ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Level 12 needs a new goal
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Oops, one more. I LOVED hunting Blackburrow at 12, it is also great money and exp. Selo s works (thank goodness as it is train central). make sure to turn
ygData.messageBody:
>Over the last few weeks, Adagia's goal was to acquire a Dragoon Dirk
>and to reach level 12 so she could finally sing Brusco's Boastful
>Bellow. Last weekend her call to purchase a Dirk in Crushbone was
>finally answered, and last night she earned the right to scribe the
>12th song. She's currently calling E. Freeport home, and she's
>finding the adventures there entertaining, but she has suddenly found
>herself without any burning immediate goals. What excitement waits
>for a Bard of 12 songs?


Oops, one more. I LOVED hunting Blackburrow at 12, it is also great money
and exp. Selo's works (thank goodness as it is train central). make sure to
turn in all your gnoll fangs in Qeynos and then trade in the gems you get
for that for beer *grin* It makes gnoll fangs worth about 2 gold each as
well as good Quenos faction. That is all the hint you need to either figure
out the quests yourself or look em up on a spoiler site. Also, I THINK I
killed Gnasher for the first time around 12, not certain though, another
good quest.

Tszaaaz E'Taurguin
